description: A great way to use up leftover roasted vegetables, these tasty bubble and squeak fritters are easy to make and full of flavour.
name: Bubble & Squeak Fritters Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place leftover vegetables, slices of 2 of the onions, egg, flour and curry powder in a large bowl. Season with pepper. Stir to combine.

Heat half the oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Pour 6 x 1/4 cupfuls of batter into oil. Cook for 4 minutes on each side or until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a plate lined with paper towels to drain. Repeat with remaining oil and batter to make a total of 12 fritters. Season.
Spoon yoghurt into a bowl, then swirl through the chutney. Serve fritters with mango chutney yoghurt and sprinkled with remaining onion.
